amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit the funds made available in this Act may be used in violation of Subtitle A of Title VIII (International Space Station Independent Safety Taskforce) of the NASA Authorization Act of 2005.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the funds made available in this Act may be used in violation of Subtitle A of Title VIII (International Space Station Independent Safety Taskforce) of the NASA Authorization Act of 2005.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A049) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A049) offered by Ms. Jackson-Lee (TX).
